text: The company announced the merger on Tuesday. Stock prices rose immediately after the news broke. By Friday, trading volume had doubled.
She graduated from college in May 2020 and started her first job three months later. She had been searching for work since February.
The earthquake struck at 3:15 AM, destroying hundreds of buildings. Rescue operations began at dawn and continued for several days.
While the president was speaking, protesters gathered outside the building. The demonstration lasted until the speech ended.
John submitted his application yesterday. The committee will review all submissions next week and announce decisions in March.
Before leaving for the airport, she checked her passport and packed her bags. The flight departed at noon.
The trial began in September and concluded in December. Throughout the proceedings, the defendant maintained his innocence.
Scientists discovered the new species in 2019. They published their findings two years later, after extensive DNA analysis.
The meeting was scheduled for 2 PM but was postponed until the following day. Several participants had conflicting appointments.
Construction of the bridge started in 2015. Workers encountered unexpected problems that delayed completion until 2020.
